When the user starts a meeting, the AI virtual assistant will start recording the audio and convert it to text using the Speech Recognition API.

The Data Mapper pattern is a software design pattern that separates the application's domain objects from the database layer.
It provides a mapping layer between the two that allows the application to interact with the database without exposing the database-specific details to the rest of the application.
In the Data Mapper pattern, domain objects are represented by a separate class hierarchy that is independent of the database.
The mapper is responsible for translating between the domain objects and the database schema.
The mapper provides an interface for the application to interact with the database, and it translates between the application's domain objects and the database schema.
This allows the application to use domain objects without knowing anything about the database layer.
